text: Not Waving, but Drowning is the second studio album by British rapper Loyle Carner. It was released on 19 April 2019 via AMF/Virgin EMI Records. ==Track listing== Credits adapted from Tidal. Notes * signifies an additional producer. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| French Albums (SNEP) | 109 |- |- |- |- |- |- |} ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2019 albums Category:Loyle Carner albums Category:AMF Records albums Category:Albums produced by Kwes
title: Not Waving, but Drowning
